channel.title: Searching on Robin Smith
channel.description: Recent content in Searching on Robin Smith

item.title: Rabin-Karp Pattern Search
item.description: Overview We often find ourselves wanting to find a smaller sequence, inside of a larger sequence. This often manifests as searching for a substring in a larger text, or determining if a list of numbers is a sublist of another. We can achieve this by looking at a sequence of characters at the beginning of the larger sequence (known as the haystack) that is the same length as the smaller sequence (known as the needle).
